rounds.response:
I’m not yet sitting with the best hand—queen-high with back-door hearts that never connected. My only showdown value is the Q kicker against an un-paired board on the river. Given that both players have checked the flop, turn, and river, P0’s range is weak but can still contain some king-x hands that beat me.

I elect a pot-sized blocker-value bet on the river to try and win the 40-chip pot immediately; it must work 40 / (40+40) = 50 % of the time to be profitable, and the line the players have taken suggests P0 will fold enough weak holdings.

[Bet 40]
